review_text: The backyard space was beautiful and relaxing to look at. The kitchen was nice and in the refrigerator there was cheese, salami, crackers, and wine, along with a sweet note from the hosts. We felt right at home. The sitting area was comfortable.

Michael was super responsive and helpful. The place was very clean. And check if was simple and convenient. They provided some special extras like wine and snacks, which was a special touch.
He went out of his way to recommend fishing spots, unfortunately the weather didn’t cooperated.
The only downside was the living room isn’t super comfortable if you decide to just hang out with guests but that wouldn’t be enough of a downside for us not to stay again.
It was perfect for us as the parents of a college student to stay and even have kids over for dinner. I think it would be awesome to stay in warmer weather to fish in the backyard.
Thank you Michael for a memorable visit!
The place and area were amazing. Our host was really friendly and responded to our messages within the hour. Would definitely love to come back next year.

Mike and Lynn's place was delightfully comfortable and quiet. It was clean and well furnished, and we really appreciated the little extra touches, including coffee, wine, and cheese from the surrounding area! We had a wonderful weekend getaway exploring the beautiful LaCrosse area, and this was the perfect spot to come back to each evening. We would definitely stay here again!
Gorgeous place to stay. He described it as noisy, but it was one of the quietest places I have stayed. The kitchen was nice, bed comfortable and view gorgeous. Will definitely stay again
A great location and well hosted place in a quiet area with lots of beautiful scenery.

I grew up in that part of Wisconsin, so I have my own haunts. This Airbnb is in a lovely location and convenient to both LaCrosse and Onalaska. Go to Red Pines for a walleye dinner, enjoy (in the summer months) Moon Tunes in LaCrosse’s Riverside Park, take a boat ride on a paddle steamer (from Riverside Park). Definitely drive up Grandad Bluff to see the view of LaCrosse, the Mississippi River and Minnesota on the other side of the river.
Such a great place and incredibly nice hosts. Very clean and they even provide some of products that the local businesses have to offer. Definitely would love to stay there again.

Michael is great! He gave suggestions for local events, biking, kayaking and vegetarian friendly restaurants and he answered questions right away. The backyard is beautiful… lots of birds and wildlife and a great way to see the sunset. We slept like babies. There are a lot of personal touches. Will definitely go back.
We had a very nice quiet stay, Michael his wife were there answer any questions we had they also gave great advice were to dine in the area! Thank you for having us at your house!

This is a great AirBnB to stay at when visiting the La Crosse area. Michael was a kind and communicative host, and the AirBnB is very clean. The WiFi is also strong - I was able to work remotely while there. We also really appreciated the coffee Michael left for us. We would stay here again when we come back to the area!

What a fantastic stay! Michael and Lyn were such gracious and incredible hosts and it was a pleasure to stay in their place. It has a gorgeous view of the Mississippi River backwaters and is very close to restaurants and the dock where we were fishing out of for the national high school fishing tournament. There was a great place to park our bass boat and truck and we slept great each night. The added touch of the charcuterie board and sodas was a wonderful addition and personal touch. I also really enjoyed chatting with Mike and Lyn at nights. They were very considerate and gave us our space, and we’re very engaging and fun to talk to once they realized I wanted to chat. I would definitely stay at the Red House again. Absolute 10/10! Thank you again Mike and Lyn!!

This was the best Airbnb I have stayed at. I was here on a work trip and was not expecting to be rushing home after my shift to relax and spend time at the redhouse. The location is right on the Mississippi and there is so much wildlife to see right from your back door. Michael and his wife were so friendly and welcoming. They made the little apartment feel like a home
This location was great for our visit to La Crosse. Nice, clean, quiet, convenient. Thanks Michael. Would definitely stay here again.

My fiancé and I stayed at “The Redhouse” while we celebrated our friends wedding on French Island. Our experience staying at this AirBNB was absolutely fantastic. The hosts are very welcoming and willing to help you out/answer any questions that you may have. The home was very clean with great amenities. I would happily stay at this AirBNB again and give it a 10/10 recommendation!
excellent place to stay

Perfect place to stay! While not on the river per se, the back deck with the water view was the perfect retreat from a hard day at work or morning coffee. The kitchen was equipped with everything we needed for our week. The wine and snacks were a welcome treat on our first night as were the bottles of water in the fridge. The selection of coffee was excellent. There's a closet full of cleaning supplies which made the stay much tidier. Michael also made sure we had good directions to the house due to some unexpected construction the week of our stay.

Great host! Especially appreciated a safe place to easily unload and store kayaks while we biked. The water, coffee, wine, and snacks is a welcomed surprise. Mike shared his knowledge of the area. Whether you are cycling, kayak, fishing, hiking, or touring the area, you can't go wrong with this ABB choice.
wonderful host and a wonderful home. you wont be disappointed.
great house and location. the hosts were friendly and super nice. highly recommend !
Michael and Lynn were great hosts and very friendly. The view from the back deck is amazing and there is lots of wildlife. The house was comfortable and spacious. We would definitely stay again!

The Red House is an inviting, beautiful, and quiet place to stay. Michael was easy to communicate with and check in was simple and straightforward. The house was nicely decorated with lots of extras that were not expected, but much appreciated! We will definitely be back and will refer this lovely place to friends.
Wayne and Melissa

This was a fantastic place to stay. Michael was there to welcome us as we pulled in the driveway. I wish we would have planned on staying a few more days. It wasn't a long enough stay to really enjoy the back yard.

Excellent location, amazing hosts and a perfect house. Michael is so kind and helpful and the location of the house is amazing for almost anything. The morning coffee on the back porch by the water was our highlight. We will be sure to come back.

We remarked again and again: The Redhouse has Peace and Serenity written all over it. Utterly gorgeous setting on the water, very romantic; secluded, but easy to find. Delightful appointments in the apartment. Michael was a gracious, thoughtful, and delightful host!!! We will definitely be coming back!

The Redhouse was a perfect spot for a few days of biking and hiking in La Crosse. The full kitchen was very useful, and the whole place was comfortable (including a nice, firm bed). The host left us a bottle of wine and some local seltzer.We particularly liked the small backyard seating area, overlooking Mississippi River backwaters. The location worked for us - in a quiet area but within 15-20 minutes of everything we needed. Communication before and during our stay was speedy and helpful.
I would not hesitate to book here again.

Michael was very kind . The Redhouse is the perfect blend of small hometown feel and genuine hospitality. Clean, spacious, and very comfortable. Every amenity we needed, close to what matters. Highly recommend the Redhouse!

The Redhouse was beautiful, clean, and in a gorgeous, easy to find location. Mike was an exceptional host with great suggestions of things to do and places to go around town. He and his wife were very welcoming and friendly. I honestly can't say enough great things about the Redhouse and its host. If you're in the area, do yourself a favor and stay here! In my experience, you will be very happy with every aspect of your stay and you'll be sad to leave!
Nice place, recently remodeled. Great location. Michael was a great host.
Easy access from I-90 and LaCrosse, such a better value than a hotel (as long as you don’t have pets or kids). Super clean and it provides everything you need!

The Red House was immaculately clean and Michael made sure every detail was covered. It was a very quiet, peaceful location adjacent to the National Bird Sanctuary, but was also minutes from many great restaurants with outdoor seating and other attractions. If you love the great outdoors and you’re looking for a great place in La Crosse that is safe, clean quiet and comfy, this is it. We highly recommend the Red House and would definitely stay here again if come back to the area.
Michael’s apartment was easy to get to and very nice. He made us feel very welcome and even spent part of his day giving us a tour of LaCrosse on bikes. We would definitely book with him again!

I can’t express how thankful I am that I found The Redhouse. We stayed here for a week and I can’t wait to come back. The river and view in the back of the house from the patio is amazing. Michael is on the next level as a host and went above and beyond to ensure that myself and my fishing partner had a comfortable stay. He is truly a stand up person. From the cleanliness and provided amenities to the view out the back doors and windows, this house is perfect.
The house is close enough to local attractions, yet secluded enough to give a person privacy.

Mike was super friendly and provided personal touches to make our stay nice. When he found out we were celebrating our anniversary, he surprised us with a bottle of champagne to celebrate! A great stay - we plan on visiting again!

This is a spacious, comfortable apartment with everything one could need. It's located on a lovely spot next to the water, which we found to be very peaceful and relaxing. The full kitchen makes this a great option for a long-term stay. Mike was a wonderful host! Friendly, helpful and accessible.
Place was clean and host was super responsive to messages.
I was great! We enjoyed our stay.

We had a lovely stay! It is cozy, comfortable home in quiet residential neighborhood. Every step of the process was easy and clearly communicated. Scott was very responsive. The fenced in backyard was perfect for our dog. We are very happy with every aspect of our stay. Thank you!
Great space in a great location.
Perfect home for my stay! Easy to get to and located close to everything in the area. Having an enclosed front porch was wonderful and would consider bringing my dog next time.

We would stay here again in a heartbeat! It was exactly what we thought it would be. Scott communicates clearly and quickly. We had everything we needed and felt totally safe and peaceful. Thank you, Scott!
It's a great place to stay, and such a great host!
Scott was amazing and the place was perfect for our little weekend trip!
Great stay! Clean beautiful house! Perfect if you have a dog! Scott thought of everything his guests would need. Didn't have to run out and buy anything!

This was a very comfortable and enjoyable location. Visiting the daughter and grandkids and it was a great place to sit and talk and play games. It is convenient to every thing in this charming town. Felt very safe in the neighborhood. We had a surprise snowfall and cold temps but the house was very comfortably heated. Good WiFi and kitchen and bathroom had all necessities. So great to have a pets-allowed option and there were no smells from previous fur guests 😊. I was concerned with the possibility of noise from the upstairs unit from earlier posts but never had any issues. Scott was very easy to communicate with and got back to me immediately with any requests or concerns. Would definitely stay again.
Amazing time at Scott's place on Liberty! Dunkin Donuts is right around the corner for a morning pick me up.
This house was accurately listed, a good location and great price.
Very spacious for the price. Charming, close to everything, and very comfortable.

Easy to find and access to enter was simple. Unit was even nicer than described and clean and cozy. Kitchen was stocked with everything we needed. Great personal touches and recommendations for nearby things to do and places to eat. Scott was very responsive to questions. Hopefully we can rent this same space in the future on our next visit to the area!
had everything that I needed to cook and scott was very nice and helpful

Comfortable and cozy stay! I appreciated all of the kitchen amenities and the coffee and filters in the cupboard. I would stay again the next time I come to town! Worth the price for sure. Charming, just as described.

Scott's place was great- would definitely stay there again and recommend to others. It was just as he described, clean, had everything we needed and was located within a 10 minute drive of the downtown area where our conference was.

We had a great stay at Scott’s place. It’s very cute, and the bed was comfortable, towels were soft and everything was clean. We were visiting our daughter at UWL and it was only a 5 minute drive to campus. We appreciated the ability to bring our dogs although we didn’t have to this time. Would definitely stay again!
We enjoyed our little stay in La Crosse, loved that it was pet friendly and had the dog bowls. Thanks for having us!
Great place. This is the fourth time we've stayed. We will certainly come back.

Scott's place was wonderful and exactly what we needed. We changed our reservation at the last minute to arrive day early to beat a snowstorm, and he easily accommodated us. The place had everything we needed, was very comfortable, and was pet friendly. We'd love to come back during another season, when we can take advantage of the nice backyard area. This place is a gem!
Scott’s place is clean, beautiful,comfortable with everything you will need. Quiet neighborhood.
Scott is a great host. We enjoyed our stay and recommend without hesitation.

It was really cute and perfect for our stay! Scott was great at answer our questions. Very well stocked kitchen with utensils, seasonings, dog bowls, etc. Only minor inconvenience was the refrigerator was leaking, causing us to have to change the towels underneath multiple times. Scott was great full for the assistance as he awaited repairs due to the holidays. Thanks Scott!
Great place. We have stayed here 3 or 4 times. Will stay again.

We've had three amazing stays in this wonderful home – the first two in the upstairs suite, 'the Buddha's Nest,' and our recent stay on the main floor was equally fantastic! The thoughtful design, warm atmosphere, and even a cheerful scribble from our toddler in the guest book made it truly special. Huge thanks to our fantastic hosts for consistently creating a welcoming haven. Future guests, you're in for a treat!

Scott’s place is centrally located to so many places in town. The home is spacious, nicely appointed, and well maintained. We loved his smaller place (upstairs) and love this one even more! This will be our first choice for future stays. The only drawback is the proximity to the railroad tracks. The train does NOT sound the horn, so it is quiet, but we got stuck at the crossing many times because the train was being moved back and forth multiple times per day. It was a small inconvenience, though, for a super AirBNB!

House is perfect for our weekend stays to see our son at college. Our stay was quiet and the space was as described. Very clean with all the amenities from home. We will definately stay here in the future and Scott is an excellent host. The dog loved it as well.
We were so comfortable here and really loved our stay! Great backyard and quite neighborhood, wish we could have stayed longer!

'How much do I love this place? Let me count the ways!' All I need to say is that it is extremely clear that Scott loves this home. I was so happy to have been welcomed home there, too. I immediately checked when I could return...sadly, too many other people love it too. No surprise! THANK YOU SCOTT FOR THE LOVE AND CARE YOU SHOW!
Very comfortable stay and cute place! Scott is an easy host to work with. Will stay again.
We enjoyed our stay, and communication was clear, and made everything run smoothly!

Five stars all the way. The house was very clean and comfortable with everything you need. My wife was with me on this trip and we both enjoyed the house and would go back without hesitation. Thank you for a great stay!
As advertised, clean, and well kept!

This place was centrally located for restaurants, bike trials and walkability. Yes there is train tracks only 2 blocks away but we never noticed when they were in the area or when they were switching cars. We would opt to stay here again if in the area. Very comfortable and loved the front porch!
Scott's place was just perfect! It's right in the middle of everything yet in a quiet neighborhood. house was clean and cozy.

Scott's house is lovely. It's nicely decorated and we were very comfortable. The bed was extremely comfortable, and the back yard was great for our dog. Scott is very accomodating and dealt with a last minute change with no hassles. I would definitely stay again.
Very clean, great host, and awesome location!!!

This is my second time at Scott's place and as long as my daughter lives in the area, I'll stay there again. Great value, comfortable place to stay and as always Scott always answers any question quickly.
Clean and plenty of space in a really convenient location. Really close to restaurants, the river and campus. Great place and a great host, couldn’t have been happier!
The place was clean and had all the amenities described. Scott is responsive and flexible.

Scott was quick to respond and proactive on letting you know how to get into via a lockbox with a key. The place was very affordable and matched the description and pictures. We enjoyed the stay, as well as exploring La Crosse.

We were so appreciative of the peaceful place to come back to after busy days. It was cool, quiet, and the beds were so comfortable. Scott was extremely responsive, and we would definitely recommend this lovely home for a stay in LaCrosse.
love Scott! Love the house :)
We spent two nights. Place was even better than pictured. Very restful after touring around. Would definitely book again.
Exactly like the photos in a convenient location. Owner was very responsive. We enjoyed our stay.
This was peaceful and quiet. It was clean and served our purpose. Scott was very responsive.
We had a wonderful stay. The house is clean and well kept. Scott is easy to communicate with and everything was as advertised. I’d definitely stay again
Great place, over all very happy with our stay there.. Everything was clean and the host was very responsive. Would definitely stay again if ever back in la crosse .. thanks!

Scott's place was comfortable and had most everything we needed. Checkin was easy and communication with Scott was great. We appreciated the recommendation of local restaurants. It's an older house, and as mentioned, you can hear the footsteps upstairs if someone is in that AirBnb. Plenty of on-street parking available.
centrally located and clean. very responsive host. I definitely recommend it
Very comfortable very clean, we enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone to stay here.
Really enjoyed my stay here! Host is easy and quick with communication, kept the place clean, accessible, and felt at home. Would definitely come back to area and stay at Scott’s place!
Cute place
The place was nice, comfortable and near the downtown area. Would recommend staying!
This place had a lot of unexpected extras, from dog dishes to doggie bags, from cooking sheets to spices, all for our use. The beds and pillows were comfortable. Great location.

Scott was a delight to coordinate with and he stopped by on the second day and we got to meet and get to know him a bit. Really great host and the place was just like his description and photos. We were very comfortable there; three adults and a 30 pound dog - plenty of room for all of us and all the amenities (even more) we needed. The screened front porch was where we spent most of our time, even preferring to just hang out comfortably there instead of running around a lot! Cute and diverse neighborhood, which made dog walking even more fun as we met a few folks and friendly dogs throughout throughout the local area. Seriously, we can hardly wait to come back and hope to do so sometime before the snow flies this year. This place is NOT a Hilton...it is relaxed and homey, and in our opinion, way better!
As advertised, everything was great and Scott was very responsive. Would definitely stay again.

Scott’s place was perfect! Quiet neighborhood, nearby walking trail, and close to downtown. Everything was spotless, kitchen was well-equipped, and the beds were super comfy! Would definitely stay here again!

We had a wonderful time and loved being in Lacrosse and close to the UW Lacrosse campus and downtown restaurants. The place was exactly as pictured and he explained that we might have "guest" neighbors upstairs. It was very easy to stay here and we appreciated that since we were busy running to other commitments for our daughter's graduation. The stay here made us so comfortable we'd like to come back to Lacrosse and explore more of what it has to offer as we feel that we could have a great day out and then return to a comfortable and welcoming home!

Great place! exactly like the pictures and description. very comfy beds and linens. perfect location for our stay as it was close to everi we need. The neighborhood isn't the greatest but the house is nice. Great back yard for the dog. I will say if people are upstairs you can hear the floor creaking and their walking around no matter how quiet they try to be. and you can hear the TV up there and then talking even if just normal, as there is an apt. upstairs too....but we would stay again for sure and recommend it as it was a very nice place and we felt right at home....

Nice Clean Place, Not a lot of noise
10/10 Recommend Staying here
The house was clean, cozy and in a nice quiet neighborhood even though it's close to the train tracks. It was a plus that it was close to downtown as well as the interstate.

We were so happy to find a place that allowed our dog and Scott even had dog bowls for us to use! The house is in an easy to find location that is close to the heart of La Crosse and UWL. There are railroad tracks 2 blocks away, but the place is well insulated with good windows, which kept the noise out. Quiet neighborhood with a convenience store and neighborhood bar within a few blocks. The beds were comfortable to sleep on as well. I recommend this place whether you have a pet or not. We will likely stay here again in the future.
Cute place conveniently located.
Easy check-in and friendly, responsive host. Perfect place for a quick weekend getaway. Great fenced in yard for the doggo!
Scott's house was comfortable for our family of four and dog.

Quiet neighborhood even though it is close to the Amtrak station. House is spacious with a dog friendly fenced backyard! The yard and screened front porch must be awesome in warm weather. Nicely decorated (not overwhelming), the king bed was quite comfortable and the themed treats were a fun surprise. Would love to stay again on a return trip to the area.
Scott had a list of recommendations of things to do and places to eat which was nice. It was a cute space and cozy. I would stay there again.
Second time staying here. will definitely stay again if in the area. I did have a small recommendation after our first stay and it was fixed!
Scott was absolutely wonderful to work with. Very responsive and helpful with everything. Place was cozy and perfect for my stay! Will definitely stay again!

Great homey place, perfect to share with family. We immediately felt right at home and the place really lacked for nothing. Great location if you are arriving by Amtrak, the home is just a few short blocks from the station.
Great host. Comfortable, clean, amazing beds, love all the kitchen items, excellent place to stay. Only place I stay when visiting family in La Crosse.

Scott was a superb host. Ran into a blizzard in La Crosse (go figure!) and he was out shoveling the drive and walk every day. Really enjoyed our time in La Crosse and the house was certainly a big piece of that!

We loved Scott's place in LaCrosse. Very clean and comfortable. He had everything you needed in the kitchen and throughout the house, along with suggestions for local attractions and restaurants. The fenced in back yard was great for our dog, he also felt at home very quickly. Also, the area is nice and conveniently located. We would definitely stay here again!

Felt right at home when we arrived. We were able to relax and enjoyed meals and playing games at the spacious table. The beds were extremely comfortable, and the location made it easy to get around town. We hope to return in the future. Well worth the price!
Enjoyed our stay at this tastefully decorated, cozy place! Very dog-friendly neighborhood, great park just a block or so away. Scott is a responsive, welcoming host.
Great comfy place
Great little house! The Asian aesthetic was unique, and the snacks expanded my palate. Overall, it was very comfortable and restful.
Great place to stay would definitely stay here again! Great host, great location, great place, host was friendly, responsive and very accommodating.

This was a nice place to stay for the weekend.
It was spotless and even had a few cooking supplies and snacks.

The house was as described. It was very comfortable, clean, and well stocked with basic needs, plus I found interesting tea in the kitchen cupboard (forgot to bring my own). Nice features and hospitality throughout the house, including good quality bed and bath linens, and kitchen appliances and amenities. Access to house was secure but easy to navigate with the emailed instructions. Pleasant and helpful communication with the host from the time of booking through to and after checking out. I am immensely pleased to find a nice, clean, smoke-free place that would allow me to bring my dog. Staying alone in unfamiliar places is stressful without my dog's company! The wonderful fenced back yard is an added bonus for both of us. I stayed in the winter and didn't hear the trains on the tracks a few blocks away. It snowed one night but the city was prompt with clearing the streets, so no problems getting around. I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone visiting La Crosse.
Second time staying here. I highly recommend.

Great little gem! We could tell Scott takes pride in his property and wants his guests to enjoy their stay. The kitchen was well stocked and it was the perfect place for our family of 4. We have already rebooked!!

My brother and I stayed at Scott's place for four nights and were very comfortable. This place has everything you need. Would not hesitate to stay again. We had to extend the stay another night and communication with Scott was super fast. It was cold with rain and snow the days we stayed but Scott was out there early making sure the sidewalks and steps were salted/shoveled. Thanks for everything!
Great place. Exactly as described and was everything we needed for our stay

I’ve stayed here twice, and expect to continue to do so every year. The unit is comfortable and clean. The beds are great, and both the bed and bath linens are newer and high quality. Great selection of premium TV channels. Perhaps best, Scott is immediately responsive when needed, otherwise you’re left alone. I clearly highly recommend this property.

Had a really lovely stay here over the Christmas holiday. My girlfriend, two dogs and I were moving across the country during very challenging weather. Scott’s place was the perfect place to hunker down from the snow, and extreme and bitterly cold weather to enjoy family time during the holidays. The fenced in backyard was secure for our pups to do their business. Easy access to grocery stores for the multi-day stay. Great access to a plowed multi-use pathway for morning runs and easy neighborhood walking for our dogs. Thanks again for a great stay!

This place was an excellent stay! Very cozy and comfortable. Quiet neighborhood and had all I needed close by. Host was very commutative about everything. He went above and beyond after a long day of work to tell me about a snow emergency and which side of the street to park on! Grateful for this as otherwise I may have gotten a ticket or been towed. Very nice to have the back yard with my pup too to not have to walk on the leash every morning. Look forward to staying here again in the future. Thanks for the great home away from home!

My best friend had just recently passed away unexpectedly, and her visitations and funeral were in La Crosse as this is where she was originally from. Two of our friends and I just needed a quiet, clean, and comfortable place to stay for a long weekend, and Scott’s AirBNB was the perfect refuge. The house was a perfect location, not far from Onalaska where funeral services were, but also close to downtown La Crosse for shopping and dining. We also appreciated that Scott had written out in the dining room a variety of recommendations for restaurants and daily deals on dining. We didn’t need much, but we very much appreciated Scott for getting back to us quickly when we had any concerns.
Quiet, clean, well furnished, love all the personal touches. Excellent quick responses to any questions. Thank you for your thoughtfulness.
Great quiet place. Comfortable and inviting. Everything you will need for a excellent stay in La Crosse.
Scott was very communicative during the whole process. Nice, intimate, and comfortable place - comfortable beds, updated appliances, clean, welcoming. Location is good and easy to find.
Well organized space and decently equipped kitchen made this an excellent fit for us. Comfortable beds, super clean. We would definitely ask to stay here again.
Very clean apartment and very attentive hosts. We recommend.
We enjoyed thiis stay. The decor was nice and the beds very comfortable . The kitchen was well equipped with every you needed to prepare a meal. We plan on coming back
Scott's place was extremely clean and exactly as described. Instructions and info was easy to find and there were some great welcome treats for us.
Really nice place to stay at. A lot of value for the dollar. They think of everything.
it was a great stay!
It was an excellent location for what I needed. Quite comfortable beds!
Nice place in a quiet neighborhood not far from downtown. Check in and check out were easy due to fantastic communication with owner.
Scott was a great host. Beautiful home and perfect location!
What a great place and very clean. Awesome set up and super comfy bed!

A nice apartment in a quiet neighborhood. Possibility to sit outside. Half hour walk to the center.
Comfortable beds. Possibility to sit outside!

This is really a very complete, comfortable space for a stay. The rooms are all very nicely sized, and the layout is great. The beds were extremely comfortable. DOGS welcome with a fenced in yard is a bonus. The neighborhood is quiet and I felt safe walking around during my stay. Scott was prompt in responding to all of my inquiries and everything went off as planned. Thank you.

My friend and I rented this affordable, little gem as our 'base home' to visit family and friends for a few days. Self check-in was easy peasy, and the house was very comfortable, quiet, and cozy with most everything we needed. The location was also very convenient to get to any of our destinations around La Crosse, West Salem, and Onalaska. Would certainly recommend to others to rent, and we would surely rent again. Thank you so much Scott!

We had a great weekend in this charming house. Scott was great to work with, the house was clean, well equipped, and welcoming. The front porch was the perfect place to curl up with a cup of coffee or glass of wine and chat and we were also able to take advantage of the back yard fire pit. Lots of places to get cozy in this house. A quick 5 minute drive to the cute shops and restaurants along the river. We'll definitely stay here again when we get back to LaCrosse.

We enjoyed our stay in La Crosse at Scott’s Airbnb. Everything was smooth from check in to check out. The pictures of the home really don’t do it justice. The decor is lovely, the beds super comfy, and the whole home very clean. If you are traveling with pets, the fenced yard is the perfect place for them to run and play. Very safe area, just minutes from restaurants and shopping. If you stay at Scott’s place you will not be disappointed.
Great place to stay! Very comfortable, clean, and homey! Quiet area as well. Scott is very accommodating and a great host! We would definitely stay here again.
great place to stay. comfortable rooms with private access to laundry. had everything we needed and was a great value!
Wonderful stay as always.
Quiet, neat, and cozy place to stay. Great communication with Scott with an easy check in process. Highly Recommended!
Great location, comfortable beds, nice bathroom. Rented because he accepts dogs. Shared backyard with the top floor, nice area to relax.

Scott’s house is wonderful! The communication was perfect and was important to us since we were traveling from so far away. Check in was incredibly easy and the location was perfect! Not 5-10 minutes away from everything!! House was very clean and we used the kitchen everyday. We would come out and visit again if we ever find ourselves in Wisconsin! :)
Very convenient location. Older home with lots of charm. Very comfortable beds, great kitchen and living room. Had everything we needed.
Lovely home in convenient location. Scott is a super star host, will definitely stay when in the area again.
Quiet and roomy space. Enjoyed the Asian-themed decor. Comfy king-sized bed. And, enjoyed biking and touring around the La Crosse area.
Close to Historic Downtown in quite neighborhood. Nicely upgraded and decorated older home. Great fenced backyard and enclosed front porch that our dogs loved. Highly recommend!
Cool spot in a good location. Nice back yard area to hangout in and comfy, clean indoors.
This location is very nice and quiet. The house is very cozy and clean. You feel like you are home.

This is an excellent property. Convenient location, clean and comfortable, and a very responsive host. Although not fancy or flashy, it is very usable, homey, and has all the amenities you'd need for a multi-day stay - a great value. We very much enjoyed our stay and especially appreciated how communicative and accommodating Scott was. We will definitely book again when next in La Crosse.
We spent a long weekend here while in town for a family event. The house was really nice for four adults - comfortable and spacious. Scott was friendly and helpful.
The home was very welcoming and clean. Great location, close to everything.
Really enjoyed our stay.
Scott provided a very nice space and great communication. Would absolutely book with him again.
Truly a steal of a deal! Place was quite and clean, and in a convenient location. Scott was an incredibly responsive and accommodating host. Will stay again if in the area.
Excellent place. Loved the fenced in yard for my pup. Scott was easy to communicate with and check in was easy. Beds were comfy and we were grateful for the snacks ;) would stay here again!

I could not have asked for more. Amazing amazing! What a great location and WOW … breathtaking loft!
It’s HUGE! You can either use the key in the glass door or take the metal steps up to the 2nd floor bedroom and use it there. I definitely recommend the metal steps, they’re easier to use. Also, the bedroom door doesn’t automatically lock, don’t forget to lock it before heading out.
After climbing either set of steps with your luggage, you can take a rest and let the ceiling fans cool you off > the dials below the thermostat.
Every room is fully stocked, just like being at home but so much more fabulous 👏 Treat yourself!!

Would 100% recommend the loft to anyone visiting la crosse! The check in/parking was super easy. The loft was big, clean and inviting! We loved all the thoughtful details- coffee, comfy bed, extra blankets, extra towels etc. The loft was close to everything- such a great location for restaurants, bars and the river.
The loft was beautiful and in such a great location. Walking distance to lots of shops and restaurants. We had a wonderful stay!
Gorgeous, clean place in a fantastic location…walking distance to everything in the downtown district. Highly recommend!!
Beautiful location, well maintained, stocked kitchen tools, and great communication from the host. The ambience was phenomenal and I highly recommend this for anyone looking for a quiet getaway.

Perfect location downtown. Walk to restaurants, bars, riverfront park and excellent grocery store one block away. One of the best appointed Airbnbs we’ve ever stayed in. Literally everything we needed in the large, open kitchen. Nice view of downtown street from living room. Bedroom looks over the large alley and we never heard any noise at night. Having the dedicated parking space was nice too. If you are mobility impaired- not for you, as there are 21 stairs to reach loft.
Great place , great host, right downtown so walked to everything..
Great place to stay. Location is awesome.
Large and well furnished. Kitchen is well equipped. Location is within walking distance of lots of restaurants, bars and shops. You can easily walk to the water front.
Beautiful Loft, fantastic kitchen and living space. Great hosts!

What an amazing place! I didn’t want to leave! Location was perfect. So close to everything. Bed and pillows were super comfy and the house had anything you could possibly need. I can not wait to come back.
We couldn't have had a better experience. Fantastic place, All of the amenities one could ever desire.. We have stayed in 20 or 30 airbnb's and I have to say this was the best of all of them.
Beautifully updated and furnished unit in quiet downtown location. Very clean and organized kitchen. Elizabeth was very helpful providing check-in instructions. Will definitely stay here again.

Elizabeth’s loft was very clean, comfortable and full of character. Within walking distance of everything you need to enjoy your stay in La Crosse. We enjoyed our stay and had all the comforts of home.
Our only small discomfort was out of the hosts full control but worth mentioning. The staircase to get into the loft is very steep and you must be able bodied to navigate the stairs.
Well worth the money for convenience of location and character of the loft!
This Loft is Gorgeous & Spacious. We loved all the brick & exposed duct work! The Loft was walking distance to the river & great restaurants! Lacrosse is a wonderful place to visit!

Modern place with all the amenities, it was a great location for us to walk to local shops, restaurants, and the convention center without having to worry about moving the car or dealing with parking fees. We especially like the historic shelving (with great books), the fully ready kitchen and dining room, and the open feel with a skylight in the bathroom, tall ceilings, and big rooms. We didn't have time or a need for the laundry or many of the things offered, but would make a point to stay here again, hopefully soon, there is a lot to see, do, and eat in the neighborhood.
Outstanding facility in a great location. Tons of open, airy space, I would recommend staying here and plan to stay again.
great place
Liz was a great host! We enjoyed our stay and the place was perfect! LaCrosse is beautiful!
Awesome place. Has everything you need to have stress free stay. Location cant be beat. Everything was great. Beautiful loft. Would stay again when in Lactosse.
Wonderful stay! Great location! Liz is a fantastic host. You won’t be disappointed.

Fabulous loft with great location and high end amenities. Lots of towels and hot water and immaculate! The kitchen was so organized, bed very comfy! We have already sent to a friend for a stay . Lots of room and the wall book shelving is a must see! Beautiful!
Was pleasantly surprised in all regards, location, quality, how supplied and value. Elizabeth was great to work with. Would definitely book again.
LOVE this place!

Me and my husband visited La Crosse for his bass fishing tournament and decided to book this Airbnb for the weekend. The place did not disappoint! The place is HUGE and was stocked with basic necessities that you would need. Elizabeth was very easy to contact as well. I love how there was a “guide” of places to visit and check out left on the countertop for us to read! Highly recommended ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Will definitely book again in the future!
Great downtown location and great host. Has everything you need.
The loft is a must see. Very well appointed. Great location. Very clean. I would highly reccomend and will stay again the next time I'm in town!

Beautiful spacious downtown loft within walking distance to everything. Elizabeth was wonderful to communicate with and the loft was stocked with all the comforts of home. We will be back and highly recommend this place! Nancy
The loft was so nice. It is so LARGE. We had a wonderful stay and we were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go. Elizabeth was very responsive. The amenities were luxurious!

I highly recommend this rental! You can’t beat the location. Just step outside and walk to everything downtown. The loft was much bigger in person than it appeared in the pics. It is such a cool space. Both the bed and pullout couch were super comfy (best pullout couch I’ve slept on). The rental was very clean and had everything we needed. Checkin/checkout were super easy and Elizabeth was available if we had any questions. We loved our stay here and would definitely book it again.

I was in town for an organic farming conference, and if I could give more than 5 stars for location and value I would. This is a unique, large, and beautiful space, intentionally curated but homey and comfortable. Elizabeth was helpful and responsive before and during my stay, and the loft had everything I needed. It was so fun to be in the heart of town but tucked away when rest or a productive zoom call was needed. Could not recommend more when you are visiting La Crosse!
